      • addCookie

        public void addCookie(org.openqa.selenium.Cookie cookie)
        Description copied from interface: org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver.Options
        Add a specific cookie. If the cookie's domain name is left blank, it is assumed that the cookie is meant for the domain of the current document.
        Specified by:
        addCookie in interface org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver.Options
        Parameters:
        cookie - The cookie to add.

      • deleteCookieNamed

        public void deleteCookieNamed(String name)
        Description copied from interface: org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver.Options
        Delete the named cookie from the current domain. This is equivalent to setting the named cookie's expiry date to some time in the past.
        Specified by:
        deleteCookieNamed in interface org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver.Options
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the cookie to delete

      • deleteCookie

        public void deleteCookie(org.openqa.selenium.Cookie cookie)
        Description copied from interface: org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver.Options
        Delete a cookie from the browser's "cookie jar". The domain of the cookie will be ignored.
        Specified by:
        deleteCookie in interface org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver.Options

        public Set<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> getCookies()
        Description copied from interface: org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver.Options

        Specified by:
